snippet.textDisplay:
Thank you to everyone who brought up the flub about 20 minutes in talking about Geoffrey Robertson as opposed to Jen Robinson. There are multiple connections to judge Nichol, Amber Heard, and Rupert Murdoch at the end of the day. Likewise Justice Nichol’s son works for talk radio UK, which is Murdoch owned. So is the tabloid that Johnny was suing. Suffice to say there are enough connections there to lend itself towards bias, and he should’ve recused himself. There is a much better video covering all of this here:

https://youtu.be/mzbwMAj73UQ

snippet.textDisplay: You speak as a survivor. It was so obvious that she was the oppressor. I don't think she even thought about the kind of ripple she was creating. She chose the wrong man. Johnny Depp has been at the top for a long time and he deserves to stay at the top. She thought she could use him to get there. She is just a horrible person. It's not just physical violence that make an abuser. There's an oppression that people don't see. The beat down before the actual beatings begin. Well said. 👏

snippet.textDisplay:
@Walter B there’s a very strong problem through all of this rhetoric with using the phrase feminism to denote misandry. One does not equate with the other. Your wife and her friends may not consider themselves to be feminists, but the truest definition of that is anyone who is a proponent for equality. Anything that wants to push the pendulum in favor of women to the exclusion of men is purely misandry, do not confuse the two.

Likewise, being a feminist does not mean that we adopt a victim mentality. Most feminists are progressive and proactive in speaking up for themselves, As opposed to a misandrist that is aggressive and regressive.

A good analogy would be all the incels that hide within the MRA movement amongst men who simply want bias to be erased within the system. The same way there are misogynists within the men’s movement, there are misandrists within the feminist movement. The job of any true feminist is too cold out people like Amber Heard and their ilk, likewise yours would be to call out men who do the same and equivalent thing.

Tiffany,
Let me start with respect for you for engaging facts. That in itself puts you ahead of most feminists.
I won’t lie, I can’t stand feminists. I will explain. However, before I do, let me tell you something. I married an engineer decades ago. She is a very intelligent and independent woman. However, she NEVER judges people by their sex organ ... she is no feminist. She rejects victimhood ... she is no feminist... she deals with facts day in and out ... she is no feminist.
So let’s clarify what a feminist is.
How did we even get to the point where Amber could beat Johnny repeatedly and smash his finger off without consequence? Feminism.
Let me be specific. Your opening gambit was “even though the victim is male, I’ll make my focus about women”.
Try this test. Look at your favourite search engine and type in “domestic violence” and see how many females you see condemned and how many males are represented ... ever... the answer is zero, not zero tolerance ... zero. How? Feminism. Let me be specific... no best, hospitalise and murder children is covered up by the world’s media (every outlet) by ... feminism.
I want to tell you two stories. One involves a boy who was friends with one of my kids. When this boy was four, his mother picked him up and threw him into a wall. He ended up in hospital with broken bones. Now, the police, the hospital, the government and the media did ... NOTHING. Why? Feminism. A few months later that father packed the kids into the car in the middle of the night because he knew he would NEVER get any support because of ... feminism.
Then, just recently, another of my kid’s friends had an incident where his estranged mother harassed him as school. She was estranged because they found bruises on his back. When he was asked he said he ndd we vet wanted to see his mother again ... so the police charged ... the father! Why? Feminism. Anyway, the father asked the school to intervene and the school said no because of ... feminism! When the lawyers got involved, the school finally said they’d protect the child. But...
A few weeks later, the school recognised the behaviour and ran DV training for boys only ... for SV against women and only women. They forced this kid to publicly opt out... because of feminism.
When Raina Thaiday murdered her 7 children, the media and government buried it... because of feminism. One attorney general came out and said DV was a an thing and discussed if all men should be screened before entering a relationship. Why? Feminism.
So let me put this on point blank terms... why can women beat and murder children with impunity? Feminism. If we have a fascist movement reminiscent of the Weimar Republic, it’s feminism.
And I’ll leave you with two other things,
1. Cassie Jaye wanted to take the Mickey on MRAs (I am not an MRA for the record, I oppose all liars and bullies and all toxic movements). She changed her mind away from feminism and became an advocate for everyone. She made a film called the red pill and the feminists went after her with a vengeance. Read her blog.. to this day, they hound her relentlessly... why? Feminism!
And lastly, I won’t even get into the aggressive bullying in education... but I will show you what my government does. It’s nothing short of mental abuse,.., why???

https://ibb.co/p2pH9Yd
https://ibb.co/NTHQf4Q

I love intelligent women and I’m married one. My female friends are all great women, not one feminist/victim/pushover among them. I will close with this again. Feminism was is and will always be a movement of malice, prejudice, bullying, lies and contempt for 1/2 the population... even violence and murder are acceptable. Just search it if you doubt me or ask Erin Pizzey.

snippet.textDisplay: I hear you! You said this so well. I also was not a fan, like  the "deppheads". AH caught my attention a few months ago because I noticed her narcissistic personality. I'm a survivor and once you've been through it you can spot it pretty clearly. Funny you said "middle school child". Narcissists don't mature past a 5 year old level. I support him because it's the right thing to do, period. I do believe that when this comes to Virginia (my home state) a jury will have no problem seeing the truth. She does not behave like a victim of dv. She is very aggressive towards him, she never tries to get away from him. You totally hit it on the head! The answer to "Why is she allowed to continue being the voice"? Elon Musk, plain and simple. JD is being revictimized by the media and it makes me sick.

You (and the other commenting on your video) just gave me faith again in feminism. Equality is not one sided, or else it is just plain domination. Your point of view on this case is so real and genuine. I thank you for that ❤️
